headline: What Airline Earnings Could Say About Travel Trends in 2026
summary: Investors could get an early peek into the outlook for travel demand this year as major airlines start reporting earnings this week.

raw.headline: What Airline Earnings Could Say About Travel Trends in 2026

headline: Delta, United, Other Airline Stocks Fall on Trump’s Credit-Card Plan. Why It’s Overdone.
summary: Delta  United and other airline stocks were falling early Monday as investors assessed President Donald Trump’s call for a 10% cap on credit-card interest rates.  Airlines make billions of dollars in revenue each year from co-branded credit cards.  Delta said it received $2 billion from American Express in the third quarter alone, up 12% year-over-year, driven by co-branded card growth.

headline: Allegiant to Buy Sun Country in Deal Valued at $1.5 Billion
summary: Sun Country’s shareholders will receive 0.1557 shares of Allegiant common stock and $4.10 in cash per Sun Country share, the companies said Sunday.  The offer is about 20% above Sun Country’s closing share price Friday, according to a release.  Shares in Sun Country rose as much as 18% to $18.54 in premarket trading Monday, while Allegiant was little changed.
